alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:56PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Blaine County through 1245 AM MDT... At 1155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 34 miles northwest of Turner to 20 miles northwest of Harlem to 9 miles northeast of Chinook. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chinook, Harlem, Fort Belknap, Turner, Lohman, Hogeland and Zurich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
